cookingTips: Whisk eggs with Worcestershire sauce for the egg wash binding layer
Set up a breading station with egg mixture and bread crumbs; dip chops in egg, then coat thoroughly with bread crumbs
Place coated chops on a lined baking sheet and bake until bread crumbs are golden and lamb reaches desired doneness
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Demonstrate proper breading technique for even coating, explain doneness temperature for lamb chops, and discuss how breading protects meat during baking.
